content: or treble_crochet depending on which stitch you re working on on this row see demo below ↓↓ 1 2 3 4 here is the potential sleeve space of course yours should be bigger - this is tips use the stitch markers for just a demo to show the increases to locate which the used stitch stitches to join i also recommend to try on the top to adjust fitting of the sleeves © copyright jeannalicce 2025
